com.facebook.litho.animation

Interface AnimationForVarArgs

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Animated.AnimationBuilder, AnimationBinding
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AppearingDimensionComponentProperty.TransitionBuilder, AppearingFloatComponentProperty.TransitionBuilder, AppearingPositionComponentProperty.TransitionBuilder, BezierTransition, DimensionComponentProperty.TransitionBuilder, DisappearingDimensionComponentProperty.TransitionBuilder, DisappearingFloatComponentProperty.TransitionBuilder, DisappearingPositionComponentProperty.TransitionBuilder, FloatComponentProperty.TransitionBuilder, ParallelBinding, PositionComponentProperty.TransitionBuilder, SequenceBinding, SpringTransition, TimingTransition, TransitionAnimationBinding

    public interface AnimationForVarArgs
    Either a AnimationBinding or a builder that can create one. This interface only exists because Java's typing system is less than ideal. We need a type that represents either an animation, or an animation builder that can return an animation so that we can expose var args methods like Animated.sequence(com.facebook.litho.animation.AnimationForVarArgs...).
